name: Nerd Font
description: Installs Nerd Fonts (e.g. Meslo, FiraCode) and updates font cache.

fonts.description: Comma-separated list of fonts to install (e.g. 'Meslo,FiraCode,JetBrainsMono'). Must match the Nerd Fonts release zip filenames.

version.description: Version of Nerd Fonts to install (e.g. '3.4.0', '3.1.1')
